xwikidoc.name: ListTablesOfXWiki
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #if($hasProgramming) #set($sqlTools = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('SQLTools.SQLToolsGroovy')) #set($system = $sqlTools.getXWikiDatabaseSystem($xwiki, $xcontext)) Your database is: **$system** #if($system == "HSQL Database Engine") {{warning}}$system is not supported for this action{{/warning}} #end #set($connection = $sqlTools.getXWikiConnection($xwiki, $xcontext)) #set($results = $sqlTools.getTables($connection)) = Table of content = {{toc /}}
= Tables = $results #else {{error}}Sorry, you need the programming rights to use this tool{{/error}} #end {{/velocity}}
